있었다, 되었다: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><radialGradient id='bg1' cx='50%' cy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E1F5FE;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:1'/></radialGradient><radialGradient id='glow1' cx='50%' cy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.6'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='spiral1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.8'/><stop offset='50%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.7'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:0.6'/></linearGradient><filter id='blur1'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='4'/></filter><filter id='shadow1'><feGaussianBlur in='SourceAlpha' stdDeviation='20'/><feOffset dx='0' dy='5' result='offsetblur'/><feComponentTransfer><feFuncA type='linear' slope='0.3'/></feComponentTransfer></filter></defs><rect width='200' height='200' fill='url(#bg1)'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='100' rx='80' ry='80' fill='url(#glow1)' filter='url(#shadow1)' opacity='0.7'/><path d='M100,30 Q150,60 140,100 Q130,140 100,150 Q70,140 60,100 Q50,60 100,30 Z' fill='url(#spiral1)' filter='url(#blur1)' opacity='0.8'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='25' fill='#FFF9C4' opacity='0.9' filter='url(#blur1)'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='90' rx='15' ry='20' fill='#FFE5B4' opacity='0.7'/></svg>
무화과나무: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='bg2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E1F5FE;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='leaf1' cx='50%' cy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:0.6'/></radialGradient><radialGradient id='fruit1' cx='50%' cy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.7'/></radialGradient><filter id='blur2'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='3'/></filter><filter id='shadow2'><feGaussianBlur in='SourceAlpha' stdDeviation='18'/><feOffset dx='0' dy='5' result='offsetblur'/><feComponentTransfer><feFuncA type='linear' slope='0.4'/></feComponentTransfer></filter></defs><rect width='200' height='200' fill='url(#bg2)'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='140' rx='40' ry='15' fill='#C8E6C9' opacity='0.3' filter='url(#blur2)'/><path d='M100,50 Q85,70 80,95 Q75,120 90,140 L110,140 Q125,120 120,95 Q115,70 100,50 Z' fill='#E1BEE7' opacity='0.6' filter='url(#shadow2)'/><ellipse cx='70' cy='70' rx='35' ry='40' fill='url(#leaf1)' filter='url(#blur2)' opacity='0.8'/><ellipse cx='130' cy='70' rx='35' ry='40' fill='url(#leaf1)' filter='url(#blur2)' opacity='0.8'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='60' rx='30' ry='35' fill='url(#leaf1)' filter='url(#blur2)' opacity='0.85'/><circle cx='95' cy='110' r='18' fill='url(#fruit1)' filter='url(#shadow2)' opacity='0.9'/><circle cx='115' cy='120' r='15' fill='url(#fruit1)' filter='url(#shadow2)' opacity='0.85'/></svg>
먹지 말라: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><radialGradient id='bg3' cx='50%' cy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF9C4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:1'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='line1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.8'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='circle1' cx='50%' cy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.7'/><stop offset='50%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.6'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:0.5'/></radialGradient><filter id='blur3'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='5'/></filter><filter id='shadow3'><feGaussianBlur in='SourceAlpha' stdDeviation='22'/><feOffset dx='0' dy='5' result='offsetblur'/><feComponentTransfer><feFuncA type='linear' slope='0.35'/></feComponentTransfer></filter></defs><rect width='200' height='200' fill='url(#bg3)'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='70' fill='url(#circle1)' filter='url(#shadow3)' opacity='0.7'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='55' fill='none' stroke='url(#line1)' stroke-width='8' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#blur3)'/><path d='M65,65 L135,135' stroke='url(#line1)' stroke-width='12' stroke-linecap='round' opacity='0.85' filter='url(#blur3)'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='25' fill='#E1BEE7' opacity='0.6' filter='url(#blur3)'/><circle cx='90' cy='90' r='10' fill='#FFE5B4' opacity='0.8'/></svg>

그리고 그들에게 입히셨다: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='bg10' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E1F5FE;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='cloth1' cx='50%' cy='30%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.7'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='flow1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:0.8'/><stop offset='50%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:0.7'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:0.6'/></linearGradient><filter id='blur10'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='4'/></filter><filter id='shadow10'><feGaussianBlur in='SourceAlpha' stdDeviation='20'/><feOffset dx='0' dy='5' result='offsetblur'/><feComponentTransfer><feFuncA type='linear' slope='0.34'/></feComponentTransfer></filter></defs><rect width='200' height='200' fill='url(#bg10)'/><path d='M70,50 Q100,45 130,50 Q135,80 130,110 L120,150 Q100,155 80,150 L70,110 Q65,80 70,50 Z' fill='url(#cloth1)' filter='url(#shadow10)' opacity='0.8'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='60' rx='40' ry='30' fill='url(#flow1)' filter='url(#blur10)' opacity='0.7'/><path d='M75,80 Q90,85 105,80 Q120,75 135,80' stroke='#E1BEE7' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.6'/><path d='M75,100 Q90,105 105,100 Q120,95 135,100' stroke='#E1BEE7' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.6'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='130' rx='30' ry='35' fill='#FFF9C4' opacity='0.7' filter='url(#blur10)'/></svg>
저주받은 땅: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='bg11' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='ground1' cx='50%' cy='70%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:0.8'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.6'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='crack1' x1='50%' y1='0%' x2='50%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.7'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.6'/></linearGradient><filter id='blur11'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='3'/></filter><filter id='shadow11'><feGaussianBlur in='SourceAlpha' stdDeviation='18'/><feOffset dx='0' dy='5' result='offsetblur'/><feComponentTransfer><feFuncA type='linear' slope='0.35'/></feComponentTransfer></filter></defs><rect width='200' height='200' fill='url(#bg11)'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='140' rx='80' ry='40' fill='url(#ground1)' filter='url(#shadow11)' opacity='0.75'/><path d='M100,100 Q95,120 90,140' stroke='url(#crack1)' stroke-width='4' fill='none' opacity='0.7' filter='url(#blur11)'/><path d='M100,100 Q105,120 110,140' stroke='url(#crack1)' stroke-width='4' fill='none' opacity='0.7' filter='url(#blur11)'/><path d='M85,110 Q75,125 70,140' stroke='url(#crack1)' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.6' filter='url(#blur11)'/><path d='M115,110 Q125,125 130,140' stroke='url(#crack1)' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.6' filter='url(#blur11)'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='80' rx='45' ry='35' fill='#FFD4E5' opacity='0.6' filter='url(#blur11)'/><circle cx='90' cy='70' r='15' fill='#E1F5FE' opacity='0.7' filter='url(#blur11)'/></svg>
그리고 내가 먹었다: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><radialGradient id='bg12' cx='50%' cy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF9C4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:1'/></radialGradient><radialGradient id='fruit12' cx='50%' cy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.7'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='bite1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.8'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:0.6'/></linearGradient><filter id='blur12'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='4'/></filter><filter id='shadow12'><feGaussianBlur in='SourceAlpha' stdDeviation='20'/><feOffset dx='0' dy='5' result='offsetblur'/><feComponentTransfer><feFuncA type='linear' slope='0.36'/></feComponentTransfer></filter></defs><rect width='200' height='200' fill='url(#bg12)'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='50' fill='url(#fruit12)' filter='url(#shadow12)' opacity='0.85'/><path d='M130,75 Q145,80 150,95 Q145,110 130,105 Q125,95 130,85 Z' fill='url(#bite1)' filter='url(#blur12)' opacity='0.7'/><ellipse cx='95' cy='90' rx='20' ry='25' fill='#FFE5B4' opacity='0.7' filter='url(#blur12)'/><circle cx='100' cy='110' r='15' fill='#E1BEE7' opacity='0.6' filter='url(#blur12)'/><ellipse cx='80' cy='100' rx='12' ry='18' fill='#C8E6C9' opacity='0.7' filter='url(#blur12)'/><path d='M100,50 Q95,55 100,65 L105,65 Q110,55 105,50 Z' fill='#C8E6C9' opacity='0.8'/></svg>
너로 말미암아: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='bg13' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E1F5FE;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='ripple1' cx='50%' cy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:0.8'/><stop offset='50%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.6'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.4'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='flow13' x1='0%' y1='50%' x2='100%' y2='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:0.7'/><stop offset='50%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:0.8'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:0.7'/></linearGradient><filter id='blur13'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='5'/></filter><filter id='shadow13'><feGaussianBlur in='SourceAlpha' stdDeviation='22'/><feOffset dx='0' dy='5' result='offsetblur'/><feComponentTransfer><feFuncA type='linear' slope='0.32'/></feComponentTransfer></filter></defs><rect width='200' height='200' fill='url(#bg13)'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='60' fill='none' stroke='url(#ripple1)' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.6' filter='url(#blur13)'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='45' fill='none' stroke='url(#ripple1)' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.7' filter='url(#blur13)'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='30' fill='none' stroke='url(#ripple1)' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#blur13)'/><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='18' fill='url(#flow13)' filter='url(#shadow13)' opacity='0.85'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='100' rx='10' ry='12' fill='#FFF9C4' opacity='0.9' filter='url(#blur13)'/></svg>

그리고 남편에게도 주니: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='bg17' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1F5FE;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='hand17' cx='50%' cy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.7'/></radialGradient><radialGradient id='gift1' cx='50%' cy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:0.6'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='flow17' x1='0%' y1='50%' x2='100%' y2='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:0.7'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:0.8'/></linearGradient><filter id='blur17'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='4'/></filter><filter id='shadow17'><feGaussianBlur in='SourceAlpha' stdDeviation='20'/><feOffset dx='0' dy='5' result='offsetblur'/><feComponentTransfer><feFuncA type='linear' slope='0.35'/></feComponentTransfer></filter></defs><rect width='200' height='200' fill='url(#bg17)'/><path d='M50,100 Q55,85 70,90 L75,120 Q65,125 55,115 Z' fill='url(#hand17)' filter='url(#shadow17)' opacity='0.8'/><path d='M150,100 Q145,85 130,90 L125,120 Q135,125 145,115 Z' fill='url(#hand17)' filter='url(#shadow17)' opacity='0.8'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='100' rx='30' ry='35' fill='url(#gift1)' filter='url(#shadow17)' opacity='0.85'/><path d='M70,100 L130,100' stroke='url(#flow17)' stroke-width='8' stroke-linecap='round' opacity='0.7' filter='url(#blur17)'/><circle cx='100' cy='95' r='18' fill='#FFF9C4' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#blur17)'/></svg>

~의 낯을 피하여, ~앞에서: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='bg19' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E1F5FE;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='face1' cx='50%' cy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.6'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='hide1' x1='0%' y1='50%' x2='100%' y2='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:0.7'/><stop offset='50%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.8'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:0.6'/></linearGradient><filter id='blur19'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='4'/></filter><filter id='shadow19'><feGaussianBlur in='SourceAlpha' stdDeviation='21'/><feOffset dx='0' dy='5' result='offsetblur'/><feComponentTransfer><feFuncA type='linear' slope='0.34'/></feComponentTransfer></filter></defs><rect width='200' height='200' fill='url(#bg19)'/><ellipse cx='80' cy='100' rx='35' ry='40' fill='url(#face1)' filter='url(#shadow19)' opacity='0.75'/><circle cx='75' cy='95' r='8' fill='#E1BEE7' opacity='0.8'/><circle cx='90' cy='95' r='8' fill='#E1BEE7' opacity='0.8'/><ellipse cx='82' cy='110' rx='10' ry='6' fill='#FFD4E5' opacity='0.7'/><path d='M110,70 Q130,85 140,100 Q130,115 110,130 L110,100 Z' fill='url(#hide1)' filter='url(#blur19)' opacity='0.8'/><ellipse cx='125' cy='100' rx='20' ry='35' fill='#B4E7F4' opacity='0.6' filter='url(#blur19)'/></svg>
수고하며, 고통 가운데: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><radialGradient id='bg20' cx='50%' cy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:1'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='toil1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.8'/><stop offset='50%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.7'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:0.6'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='burden1' cx='50%' cy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:0.8'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.6'/></radialGradient><filter id='blur20'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='4'/></filter><filter id='shadow20'><feGaussianBlur in='SourceAlpha' stdDeviation='20'/><feOffset dx='0' dy='5' result='offsetblur'/><feComponentTransfer><feFuncA type='linear' slope='0.36'/></feComponentTransfer></filter></defs><rect width='200' height='200' fill='url(#bg20)'/><path d='M70,120 Q65,105 70,90 L75,85 L80,100 L85,115 Q85,130 75,135 Z' fill='url(#toil1)' filter='url(#shadow20)' opacity='0.8'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='70' rx='45' ry='35' fill='url(#burden1)' filter='url(#shadow20)' opacity='0.75'/><path d='M100,70 Q95,90 95,110 L105,110 Q105,90 100,70 Z' fill='#E1BEE7' opacity='0.7' filter='url(#blur20)'/><circle cx='95' cy='65' r='12' fill='#FFF9C4' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#blur20)'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='130' rx='30' ry='20' fill='#FFD4E5' opacity='0.6' filter='url(#blur20)'/><path d='M70,140 Q85,145 100,140 Q115,135 130,140' stroke='#E1BEE7' stroke-width='6' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' opacity='0.6'/></svg>
